CareBarrierType.name: CareBarrierType
CareBarrierType.description: Represents the standard, defined list of barriers maintained by an organization.

Code.description: Medical vocabulary code for the barrier.

CodeType.description: Medical vocabulary code type for the barrier.

DiagnosisCodeSetId.description: Diagnosis code set associated with the care barrier type.

HealthCareDiagnosisId.description: Diagnosis code for the barrier. HealthCareDiagnosisId may be deprecated in a future release, so use DiagnosisCodeSetId instead.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether this care barrier type is active.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Name of the care barrier type.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.
